attributes.action: Give every household in the UK a 3 Month Domestic Council Tax holiday
attributes.additional_details: Keep people believing that those in charge care about individuals rather than just businesses
attributes.background: Simply take some of the the financial stress off hard working families, who may be facing crisis due to Covid-19.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
